title: Hello Kitty font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108222321im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LogoHelloKitty450_5956.png)

Hi everyone ;) Trying to locate this font

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [LogoHelloKitty450.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108222321/http:/typophile.com/files/LogoHelloKitty450.png) | 6.69 KB |
author: wodeczka94

comments.content:
Hello  
I think is a custom logo but maybe you can adapt  
Zanya Bold  
 [http://myfonts.us/FvAaUL](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108222321/http:/myfonts.us/FvAaUL "http://myfonts.us/FvAaUL")  
or  
Wendy LP Bold  
 [http://myfonts.us/DXdqa6](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108222321/http:/myfonts.us/DXdqa6 "http://myfonts.us/DXdqa6")  
Alex

Another good candidate for adaptation: Sydney

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108222321im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SydneyAsHelloKitty_6627.jpg)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/aboutype/sydney/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108222321/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/aboutype/sydney/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/aboutype/sydney/")  
Don
